hangle: 그럼 내가 가만히 있을 줄 알았나.
first_translate: did you  think I’d just sit back and do nothing about this?
I’ve got him right where I want him now...
what are your plans for the future?
for starters,  I need to finish what his grace has asked me to do here at the manor.
it’s been that way since we first met.
even though you never stay anywhere long enough to settle down or give anyone your heart completely,

hangle: 온전히 마음을 줄 생각은 없는 주제에 상냥했다.
first_translate: you were still kind toward others.

hangle: 어차피 떠날 거면 아벨도 아예 내쳐버리지 그랬어.
first_translate: if you knew you would leave anyway, why didn’t you cut ties with abel from the start?

hangle: 그랬다가는 공작님이 대륙 끝까지 쫓아올 걸?
first_translate: but if she did that,  his grace might have chased her all across the continent.

hangle: 내가 좀 무른 면이 있다는 걸 부정할 수는 없지만.
first_translate: I can’t deny that there is some truth to that statement.

hangle: 난 늘 틈을 파고들어서 지금까지 쭉 곁에 있을 수 있었어.
first_translate: that’s how I was able to find my place by your side until now.

hangle: 넌 내가 이런 생각을 하는 줄은 모르겠지.
first_translate: of course,  you probably don’t know any of these thoughts running through my head.
after finishing up everything here, what will you do then?
I’m going to buy myself a house.
at first,  I thought maybe somewhere out in the countryside,
but after thinking more on it, I realized it’ll be too inconvenient living far away from civilization.

hangle: 그냥 좀 조용한 외곽 쪽의 집을―
first_translate: maybe I could get something quiet near the outskirts--
why does he seem different today...?
do you remember what you said before?
huh?! w-what am I supposed to remember?!
...that whenever you needed help, I’d come to your aid no matter what.
oh yeah,  I remember saying that.
I feel like now is one such time when I really need someone.
how did you reach that conclusion?
isn’t life treating you well nowadays?
are you seriously asking me that question without knowing anything?
are you seriously asking me that question without knowing anything?
I confessed to fiona about my birth.
in reality,  I’m part of the imperial family bloodline.
my mother and I had to live in hiding because of that fact,
and eventually,  she died protecting me.

hangle: 어머니를 죽인 자들을 용서 할 수 없어.
first_translate: I haven’t forgiven those responsible for killing her.
no matter what happens, you deserve happiness.
you mean a lot to me.

hangle: 피오나는 그 모든 파괴적인 감정을 옅게 한다.
first_translate: all of those destructive emotions fade into insignificance thanks to fiona.

hangle: 피오나가 없어지면 내가 과연 계속 평온할 수 있을까?
first_translate: if she disappears,  will I ever be able to remain calm again?

hangle: 피오나, 난 지금 타지에 혼자 와 있어.
first_translate: fiona,  I’m currently alone in a foreign land.
on top of that, everyone here seems hostile towards me.

hangle: 오랜 친구가 곁에 있길 원하는 게 당연한 것 아냐?
first_translate: isn’t it only normal that I wish to have a close friend nearby?

hangle: 너 진짜로 내가 아벨한테 정신적인 위안을 받을 거라 생각하는 건 아니지?
first_translate: wait, you weren’t actually expecting me to receive emotional support from abel, were you?
come rest against me, my beloved pupil...!
wow, even imagining that feels weird.

hangle: 이제 곧 예쁘고 상냥한 운명의 소녀를 만날 수도 있잖아.
first_translate: who knows?  you may meet a beautiful girl destined to become yours soon.
geez, siegren. sometimes you can be pretty slow-witted.

hangle: 네 입장에서는 이제 내가 귀찮을 수도 있겠지.
first_translate: from your perspective, I guess having me around must be annoying.
most people saw me as troublesome.

hangle: 아무래도 내가 무리한 부탁을 했나 보네.
first_translate: seems like I made an unreasonable request.

hangle: 시그렌은 이제 갓 고등학교를 졸업한 나이나 마찬가지인데?
first_translate: siegren’s basically fresh out of high school.
if my presence helps you somehow.

hangle: 그래, 난 딱히 손해 볼 것도 없…없을테니까?
first_translate: okay, I won’t lose much either... r-right?
like I said, you’re very soft-hearted.
and you still cherish our friendship.

hangle: 아는 사람이 남아 줘서 안심이 되나 봐.
first_translate: I suppose it makes sense that I'd feel relieved knowing someone familiar will be sticking around.
until finally, the original story began unfolding.
abel says it's almost time to go downstairs.
tell him I'll be coming down shortly.
